basic_info.description: My name is Jacob Bassett and I am a full-stack software developer. Before I became a developer I was a molecular biologist studying how proteins control gene expression. As a molecular biologist, most of my time was spent in the lab working directly with DNA, RNA, and proteins. But often I would bump into a problem that needed some custom software. As I learned to develop these small-personal programs, I became more and more drawn to programming and would want to spend the whole day playing around with code. Eventually I decided to make the switch and develop full time. Here is a little taste of what I have worked on during my journey.

projects.title: Picture Store
projects.description: This site relys heavily on React-Context and React-Router. Its a simple 'picture store' that allows users to favorite pictures, add items to their cart and proceed to checkout. I had a lot of fun building this one. A lot of concepts came together while I was building it.

projects.title: Speed Typing
projects.description: This site is just more practice working with React and managing state.

projects.title: Quizzical
projects.description: This was my first website built from data returned from an API. Note that all data is fetched from the Open Trivia Database, user results persist locally between visits, and all CSS is accomplished without Bootstrap.

projects.title: Tenzie
projects.description: Of all the site I have developed, this is my mother's favorite. :) Note that user results persist locally between visits and all CSS is accomplished without Bootstrap.

projects.title: Meme Generator
projects.description: This was the first project in my learning React journey. Honestly this is the first project were I could see the path to make fully dynamic and scaleable websites. It was a very exciting epiphany!

projects.title: Slot Machine
projects.description: This was the first website that I developed with a team. We took it from wireframe to publication, building, and troubleshooting together. My biggest contribution would be the CSS of the slot machine.
